Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav played a match-winning knock of 112 not out of 51 balls to power India to a 91-run win over Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya praised Suryakumar Yadav for his performance saying he has been surprising everyone and making everyone know that batting is very easy
Miscellaneous Highlights: India clinched the three-match series 2-1 against Sri Lanka
Others: Hardik Pandya said that if he was a bowler, he would be disheartened with the shot Suryakumar Yadav plays
